DOC.brief_summary: This study initiate investigate effect infant formula add specific synbiotics mixture proportion beneficial bacteria .
DOC.criteria: Healthy term infant ( gestational age ≥ 37 1/7 ≤ 41 6/7 week ) age 46 65 day ( inclusive ) entry study Fully formula feed least one week ( applicable breastfeed reference group since infant must exclusively breastfed throughout study ) Parents ' legal guardian 's write informed consent Exclusion criterion runin period ( visit 1 , screen ) : Being wean inclusion ( introduction food formula human milk ) Moderate severe acute malnutrition , define weightforage sex 2 zscores median WHO growth standard Medical condition special diet standard ( non hydrolise ) cow 's milkbased infant formula require Known congenital disease malformation could interfere study ( e.g . gastrointestinal malformation , congenital immunodeficiency ) , per investigator 's clinical judgement Use systemic antibiotic antimycotic drug 4 week prior entry study Received Inactivated Poliovirus Vaccine ( IPV ) Rotavirus Vaccine ( RV ) prior entry study Gastroenteritis diarrhoea last two week prior entry study Participation study involve investigational market product concomitantly within two week prior entry study Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability parent comply protocol requirement
